topComments.author: Tridip Chakraborty
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Namika La (ou Namki La) √© a segunda passagem mais alta da rodovia Srinagar Leh (NH1). √â um lugar tranquilo porque poucos turistas se aventuram at√© este ponto de Leh. As vistas s√£o incr√≠veis - montanhas rochosas ao redor, cumes de montanhas cobertas de neve ao longe, e a estrada de alcatr√£o preto serpenteando por ela em ambos os lados da passagem. N√£o h√° instala√ß√µes ou lojas aqui, apenas uma placa.  (Original) Namika La (or Namki La) is the 2nd highest pass on the Srinagar Leh highway (NH1). It's a peaceful place because not many tourists venture upto this point from Leh. The views are amazing - rolling rocky mountains all around, snow capped mountain tops in the distance, and the black tar highway snaking through it on both sides of the pass. There are no facilities or shops here, just a signboard.

topComments.author: Siddhartha Agrawal
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Segundo ponto mais alto na viagem para Leh a 12139 p√©s  Tamb√©m √© chamado de pilar da passagem do c√©u  A outra passagem √© Fotu La, que √© a mais alta  Vistas incr√≠veis daqui. Ao vir de Srinagar via Kargil, √© aqui que voc√™ tem o primeiro vislumbre da topografia de Ladakh e das colinas √°ridas, exclusivas da regi√£o  Voc√™ √© obrigado a parar aqui para algumas fotos antes de prosseguir.  Talvez tome uma x√≠cara de ch√° ou caf√© quente.  (Original) Second highest point in journey to Leh at 12139 ft  It's also called the pillar of the sky pass  The other pass is Fotu La which is the highest  Incredible views from here. While coming from Srinagar via Kargil, this is where you get the first glimpse of the Ladakh topography and the barren hills, unique to the region  You are bound to stop here for a few photographs before you proceed.  Maybe have a cup of hot tea or coffee.

topComments.author: Ankita Makraria
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Atravessamos a passagem Namik La a caminho de Kargil de Leh. Localizado a 12.139 p√©s de altitude, esta passagem oferece uma bela vista da cordilheira do Himalaia Zanskar. Est√°vamos aqui no inverno e em um dia nublado as montanhas cobertas de neve quase se fundindo com o c√©u dando um cen√°rio deslumbrante. As estradas s√£o boas, mas sinuosas e, portanto, dirija com cuidado e devagar. Tenha uma boa viagem..  (Original) We crossed Namik La pass on our way to Kargil from Leh. Located at 12,139 ft. Altitude this pass gives a beautiful view of the Himalayan Zanskar range. We were here in winters and on a cloudy day the snow clad mountains were almost merging with the sky giving a stunning scenery. The roads are good but curvy and hence drive carefully and slow. Have a great trip..

(Original) NamikLa Pass is the 2nd pass on Leh Srinagar route , Namika La or Namika Pass, Pillar of the Sky Pass, is a high mountain pass in the Himalayas Zaskar Range on Srinagar-Leh highway , Namika La is one of two high passes between Kargil and Leh, the other is the even higher Fotu La Pass.

topComments.author: Mohammad Wasim
topComments.comment: One of the two highest passes between Kargil and Leh, the other being Fotu La, towards Leh.  Both of them are some of the remotest passes, deep within the Himalayas.

topComments.author: vishal solanki
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) mem√≥ria de tempo de vida para dirigir nesta estrada  Namikala pass, localizado na faixa de Zanskar que liga a rodovia Srinagar-Leh. Este passe localizado na altura de 12.139 p√©s acima do n√≠vel do mar √© tamb√©m conhecido como o pilar do c√©u passa. Namikala pass est√° situado no caminho para o vale Mulbek. Os turistas aqui podem ver as gravuras rupestres do Buda Maitreya, assim como um Gompa. √â uma das mais importantes passagens de Ladakh e a √∫ltima tamb√©m, antes de entrarmos na regi√£o de Kargil. Voc√™ encontrar√° v√°rias placas com informa√ß√µes importantes. Embora uma terra est√©ril, mas uma vez que voc√™ cruzar a passagem voc√™ pode admirar a vista deslumbrante da paisagem verdejante e picos cobertos de neve.  (Original) life time memory to drive on this road  Namikala pass, located at the Zanskar range that connects Srinagar- Leh highway. This pass located at the height of 12,139 feet above the sea level is also known as the pillar of the sky passes. Namikala pass is situated on the way to Mulbek valley. Tourists here can see the rock carvings of Maitreya Buddha as well as a Gompa. It is one of the most important passess in Ladakh and the last one too, before one enters the Kargil region. You will find a number of signboards giving important information. Although a barren¬† land, but once you cross the pass you can¬† admire the breathtaking view of the lush green surroundings and snow-covered peaks.

topComments.author: Negi Wanderlust
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Namika La ou Namika Pass, Pilar do Sky Pass, √© uma passagem de alta montanha no Himalaia Zaskar Range, na √çndia, ao longo da rodovia Srinagar-Leh. Namika La √© um dos dois passes mais altos entre Kargil e Leh, o outro √© o ainda mais alto Fotu La Pass.  (Original) Namika La or Namika Pass, Pillar of the Sky Pass, is a high mountain pass in the Himalayas Zaskar Range in India along the Srinagar-Leh highway. Namika La is one of two high passes between Kargil and Leh, the other is the even higher Fotu La Pass.

This highway from Srinagar to Leh is kept open throughout the year with great efforts by BRO to safe guard the border from Pakistan.

topComments.author: Safarnamastudio
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um paas incr√≠vel durante um #DreamDestination. # Leh-Ladakh. Este passe est√° a uma altitude de 12198 p√©s e voc√™ pode encontrar-se claramente alto. Voc√™ sentir√° que est√° no c√©u. Embora #Sunshine (luz do sol) tente fazer todos os esfor√ßos para queim√°-lo, no entanto, a brisa fria com uma velocidade incr√≠vel n√£o deixar√° isso acontecer. Uma parada obrigat√≥ria se voc√™ estiver indo para #Ladakh atrav√©s de #Jammu e #Kashmir. Adorei estar aqui e passar mais de uma hora.  Boas vistas panor√¢micas da montanha #desert.  (Original) An amazing paas during a #DreamDestination . #Leh-Ladakh. This pass is at an altitude of 12198 feet and you can clearly find yourself high. You will feel that you are in the sky. Though, #Sunshine (sunlight) will try to make all the efforts to burn you, however, the cold breeze with an amazing speed won't let that happen. A must stop if you are going to #Ladakh through #Jammu & #Kashmir. Loved being here and spend more than an hour.  Good scenic views of #desert #mountain.
